title: A receiver, executor or administrator or a manager appointed by any court of competent jurisdiction
clause_text: A receiver, executor or administrator or a manager appointed by any court of competent jurisdiction to have the charge of, or to exercise the rights of the owner; and
section: Special Regulations for the Improvement Schemes :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
